Title: Prohibits the assessment of fees for real property taxes owed on real property owned by small businesses and small landlords during the COVID-19 state disaster emergency
Summary: Prohibits the assessment of fees for real property taxes owed on real property owned by small businesses and small landlords during the COVID-19 state disaster emergency through 90 days after the end of such state disaster emergency.
ActClause: AN ACT to prohibit the assessment of fees for real property taxes owed on real property owned by small businesses and small landlords during the COVID-19 state disaster emergency
